about_the_game:
Description of Adult Content

The developer describes the content as follows

The game contains adult content such as sexual behavior, nudity, nakedness, etc. It is not suitable for all viewers. The characters in the game are over 18 years old.

The adventures of a girl who aspires to become a legendary adventurer!


◆Synopsis◆
The main character "Lilie" visits a city.
While completing the guild's quests as an adventurer, she has to face the danger that attacks the city...

Game System
(1)Various play feel
　・Basically, turn-based battle!
　・You can enjoy different play depending on the scene!

(2) Easy design with minimal hassle!
　・No leveling up!　Skill system.
　・No need to spend money!　Crafting system.
　・No Game Over!　Story progresses automatically.
　・Movement of places is selective.
　・The part to be played repeatedly is simplified to improve efficiency.

◆Assumed play time◆
　・Clear the game: 1 to 2 hours
　・Completion of collection elements: about 3 hours

◆H-scenes◆
　・Number of scenes: 25
　・Number of CG: about 120 (including difference)

Character Introduction


◆Lilie.

The protagonist of this work.
She is a lively and energetic girl who aspires to become a legendary adventurer.

She is a little bit conceited and has a false perception of adventurers.

Characteristics
　・A young lady
　・Ponytail
　・Exposed a lot
　・She is very active in sex

◆Pike
　The guild master of the city Lilie visited.
　He is a nice guy who helps Lilie in various situations.
　He is trusted by Lilie.

◆Cal
　The owner of the inn where Lilie stays.
　His attentive service is well-received.
　He seems to have a faint crush on Lilie.

◆Mara
　A woman? who runs an exchange store.
　She sells various rare items.
　She is a reliable person who takes care of Lilie in any way she can.

◆Bikini Girl
　A girl who has been an adventurer a little before Lilie.
　She and Lilie have met each other by chance.

◆Lord
　The lord of the city Lilie visited.
　He has been acting flamboyant lately...

◆???
　A mysterious character.
　Seems to be following Lilie...?
